message.msg: Racoonbot is Raccoon's built-in robot, here to help you keep your own notes and private files in order.
Messages you send and files you upload to Racoonbot are searchable and visible only to you. Just click on Racoonbot in your Direct Messages list to get started.
You can configure Racoonbot to respond to your team members. While there are plenty of work-related uses for this, most teams just use the feature for fun.
Your team can set up Racoonbot to say things programmatically by creating a new Racoonbot integration. This will give your team a unique URL for posting messages as Racoonbot via HTTP POST.
